arts.ttl: Lazio Fall Apart in Parma as Nicolo Rovella Goes From Hero to Zero
arts.sum: After winning their last five Serie A fixtures, Lazio saw their purple patch come to an end as they succumbed to a 1-3 defeat at the hands of their hosts Parma. Lazio Starting Lineup Marco Baroni started with a hybrid formation varying between 4-2-3-1 and 4-3-3, depending on how to interpret Fisayo Dele-Bashiru’s role in […] The post Lazio Fall Apart in Parma as Nicolo Rovella Goes From Hero to Zero appeared first on The Laziali.

arts.ttl: McTominay goal gives Serie A leader Napoli win over Torino as Lazio loses ground
arts.sum: Napoli ground out a 1-0 win at Torino to ensure it will end the weekend still top of a tight Serie A table, while at least one of its opponents dropped points on Sunday. Scott McTominay scored the only goal of the match in the first half as Napoli pulled away from one of its closest rivals as Lazio lost 3-1 at relegation-threatened Parma.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Lazio 3-1 Parma: Match Report
